msbt.message: Hey, quick question Got any plans to visit soon, ?I was cleanin' house and found this thing I borrowed from , and I'm kinda too embarrassed to return it.Can you hand it off for me so I don't have to show my sorry face?
Sure thing!
Sorry, but no.

Hoo boy. came to visit and forgot something, which doesn't surprise me.I ran after as soon as I noticed, but must've had a head start.Can you give this back to so I can stop feelin' guilty every time I see the thing?
Leave it to me!
Can't help you there.

So get this. The mail carrier messed up and delivered a package for to my place.I noticed at the last second before tearing it openbut now I got a problem.Thing is, I'm kinda busy today. You think you could take this to for me?
I'm on it!
Uh, sorry.
Yesss! I knew you wouldn't let me down. Here's the thing I need you to deliver for me. Thanks in advance!
How'd I know you'd say yes? Probably 'cause you're that cool. Here's the thing. Good luck with it!
Thanks, pal! I thought it'd be less awkward with someone else doin' it for me. Well, here it is. You rock!
YeahI probably oughta face the music myself. I'll go return itonce I work up the nerve, .
I know, I know. I should go and get it over with already. OK, here goes! No more dillydallyin', !
Not your fault. Not mine either, come to think of it. Why am I being so weird about it?! This has gotta stop!

! I was hopin' I'd run into you. Listen, I need a favor.Next to you, has been one of my best buds, so I wanted to give somethin'.But I feel like if I give a present outta nowhere, it's gonna get weird. And that's where you come in!
Sure, I'll deliver it.
Pull yourself together!

Hey, , you got a minute?I got into a dumb fight with . I don't even wanna say what it was about.I wanna make it up to with this present I bought, but I dunno if would wanna see my face right now.I was thinkin'maybe you could give it to for me?
I'll take care of this!
You should do it!
I knew you'd be the one for the job! All you gotta do is give this to . Thanks!
Thanks, buddy! You're really helpin' me out here. I guess I should give you the thing, huh? Here y'go!
Wow, harshbut fair. Aw, slugs, I hate gettin' caught being all mushy, but I'll do it for .Oh, but maybe I could go in disguise. Pull the old "mysterious stranger shows up with a gift" gag. Yeah
Y'know, you're right. I oughta suck it up and take my medicine.Thanks for steerin' me straight, . Sometimes you need a push to do the right thing.
I was hopin' to get it to 'em sometime today. You're losin' daylight, !
Hmm, it's gettin' late, ain't it? If you can't get it to 'em today, tomorrow works too. Just don't forget!
lent it to me, so that's who I need to get it back to. Thanks for doin' this!
That , right? What a scatterbrain.Sorry to fob this off on you, but I trust you to get it done for me, .
That package has gotta get to this time. Thanks for the help, !
That ain't just any ol' package I'm trustin' you with. That's me pourin' my heart out to !Which I guess makes you a pitcher? Eh, you get the idea!
A lot's ridin' on that package I gave you to deliver.Whether or not and me are still friends tomorrow is all up to you, !
